title: Stylish Niagara Falls Retreat Moments from Iconic State Park with Chic Restaurant & Bar
description: Enjoy all the comforts of a city stay just a stone's throw from one of the USA's most iconic national parks with a stay at voco The Cadence, an IHG Hotel. Spend a day wandering around the famous Niagara Falls State Park where you can board the iconic Maid of the Mist, adventure to the Cave of the Winds or hike through the lush landscape. On returning, retreat to the cosy confines of Sēvā Kitchen and Bar and savour delicious seasonal ingredients and creative cocktails.
